definition: Xiaohe district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou

sentences.english: They had been working in the stream for a week but they hadn't panned out.
sentences.chinese: 他们在那条小河里淘洗了一个星期，但没有淘出金子。

sentences.english: On the other side of the brook, there are many trees. There are lots of green bamboo groves.
sentences.chinese: 在小河的一边有许多树木，还有一片翠绿的竹林。

sentences.english: The path led straight through a wide stream.
sentences.chinese: 小道的前面横躺着一条小河，河面很宽。

sentences.english: They irrigated their crops with water from this river .
sentences.chinese: 他们用这条小河里的水浇庄稼。

sentences.english: He has often cast this brook.
The ice in the rive melts away and some fishes swimming in it.
sentences.chinese: 小河里的冰都融化了，很多鱼儿在那里面游来游去。

sentences.english: I sit down along a brooklet with a booklet in hand.
sentences.chinese: 我手捧一本小册子，坐在一条小河旁。

sentences.english: Because of the nature of impermanence within the clouds, the river suffered very much.
sentences.chinese: 云彩那变化无常的本性，可让小河受尽了苦头。
他常在这条小河边钓鱼。

sentences.english: She lay on the bank, listening to the ripple of the stream.
sentences.chinese: 她躺在河岸上，听着小河的潺潺流水声。

sentences.english: The stream has thinned down to a mere trickle.
A lover of revolvers , rivers, and the poor house.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢左轮手枪，小河和破旧的房子。

sentences.english: They had been working the stream for ten days but it hadn't panned out.
sentences.chinese: 他们在那条小河里淘选了十天，但没有淘出金子。

sentences.english: The stream parallels the road for several miles.
sentences.chinese: 这条小河与那条道平行数英里。

sentences.english: The few small rivers could not hold all the rain that fell during the wet season.
sentences.chinese: 几条小河容不下雨季的全部雨水。

sentences.english: We have got past the big rivers and just turned into a little one.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经经过了大河，正转入一条小河中。

definition: Xiao Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
